article.headline: U.K. broadcaster says positive Oxford vaccine news may come
article.body: Positive news may come Thursday on initial trials of the Oxford Covid-19 vaccine that is backed by AstraZeneca AZN, +1.16% AZN, +0.63%, according to a report from U.K. television broadcaster ITV. The report said "apparently the vaccine is generating the kind of antibody and T-cell (killer cell) response that the researchers would hope to see."
